resources.string: Enter the mobile number where you can be contacted. No one will see this on your profile.
You may receive WhatsApp and SMS notifications from us for security and login purposes.
You may receive Emails from us for security and login purposes.
Enter you email where you can be contacted. No one will see this on your profile.
Create a password with at least 6 letters or numbers. it should be something others can’t guess.
To confirm you account, enter the 6-digit code we sent via SMS to placeholder
Use your own birthday, even if this account is for a business, a pet or something else. No one will see this unless you choose to share it.
Why do i need to provide my birthday?
Looks like your mobile number may be incorrect try rechecking your number
Looks like you have not entered your mobile number
\@Rashid ekabl btech cse computer science student lloking forward for job oppurtinity
you can only change you name twice within 15 days.
your name is visible to everyone on and off Threadly.
your name is visible to everyone on and off Threadly.
Help people discover your account by using the name you\'re known by: either full name, nick name, or buisness name.
In most cases, you will be able to change your username back to your original for another 14 days.
Username must be at least 6 characters long.
Username cannot be more than 20 characters long.
Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
Username already exists, please try another one
Something went wrong, please try again later
Name must be at least 3 characters long or shorter than 20 characters
Bio cannot be longer than 150 characters
